name: Eternal Punishment (Yuukurisu)
description:
You died and were sent to hell, there Lucifer tells you that you have another chance to live, all you have to do is pass through two gates of Hell,  and if you can't, you'll be stuck in this loop of eternal punishment. Beware, demons love to cheat. 

Eternal Punishment is a small platformer game made for Ludum Dare 47. 

Theme: Stuck in a Loop

Controls: 

A and D or Arrow Keys to move. 

Space to jump.

Shift to dash.
